data.title: Pediatric Dentist & Dentistry in Sarasota, FL
data.meta_description: SmileWorks Kids Dentistry is a pediatric dentist office serving Sarasota, FL. We serve infants, children, teens and special healthcare needs patients. Make an appointment with us today!
data.text:
The highest standard of service, quality, and expertise in pediatric dentistry for your child, from infancy through adolescence. Our office is conveniently located in Sarasota, FL.

Designed to delight and warmly engage children from 1-18 years old, SmileWorks Kids Dentistry was created by Sarasota native Dr. Manav Malik (“Dr. M&M”) to provide children with high quality dentistry in a fun, safe, and positive manner. Children love the open, play-oriented office environment and parents enjoy being welcomed back to our treatment area with their child. Come visit our one-of-a-kind office and experience a whole new way of caring for infants, toddlers, children and teens!

We recognize that all of our patients are unique and deserve to receive dental care that reflects their individual needs. We utilize the latest technology and most current techniques to ensure your child receives the highest standard of care. Our experienced dental team is committed to working with you and your family to create a comfortable, stress-free, and rewarding dental experience every time you visit our practice. We are pleased to welcome you and your family, and we look forward to working with you.

With its neon-green facade and bright purple signs and awnings, SmileWorks Kids Dentistry stands out among the office and medical parks on Fruitville Road. Inside, it gets even better. Dr. M&M wanted a dental office that would "be 'one-of-a-kind in the state' while eliminating the fear and anxiety kids often associate with dental visits. Computer stations, five video game stations, baby and toddler toys and giant murals make it feel more like a kid's dream arcade."

-941CEO magazine
